description_for_model: Send natural-language goals to the Infinity Orchestrator GitHub App (Infinity-X-One-Systems/infinity-orchestrator). The Orchestrator validates via TAP Protocol, runs multi-agent discovery/scoring/build phases, then dispatches commands to the Construct-OS platform (InfinityXOneSystems/construct-iq-360). Use triggerOrchestrator to send goals like 'generate a residential bid for Smith Residence' or 'run the Hunter lead sniper agent'. Use dispatchInventionTrigger for structured cross-repo commands. Use listOrchestratorRuns or listConstructRuns to check runner status. Authentication requires a GitHub token with repo access to Infinity-X-One-Systems/infinity-orchestrator.
description_for_human: Control Construct-OS via the Infinity Orchestrator: generate construction documents, run AI agents (Hunter, Architect, Orator, Shadow), manage leads, billing, and deployments â€” all through the Infinity Orchestrator GitHub App runner.
